website_summaries.verdict: A good budget-alternative car alarm system with the most important security features.
pros: Long range wireless command reception works up to 1/4 mile away
Shock sensor activates when it detects motion for theft attempts on the car's exterior
cons: Controlling the active state of the alarm is difficult on the included remote

product_meta.title: Viper 3100VX 1-Way Security System
product_meta.description: Viper's entry level security system gives you all of the features you need without the added expense. Being an entry level alarm system it doesn't come with a siren so you can use your vehicle's factory horn for a simplified installation. Comes with Viper's widely used remote (473V) for ease of use and convenience should you ever lose or need to replace one.
feature_bullets: Control the vehicle from up to 1/4 mile away
Status LED Alerts thieves that the vehicle is equipped with a Security System
